StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetAEPFileLog]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int AS
SELECT U.AEP_FILE_UPLOAD_LOG_ID, 0 AS AEP_FILE_DOWNLOAD_LOG_ID, U.[FILE_NAME], LEFT(U.[FILE_NAME], CHARINDEX('_', U.[FILE_NAME]) - 1) + RIGHT(U.[FILE_NAME], 4) AS FILE_DISPLAY_NAME, U.USER_LOGIN, CONVERT(VARCHAR(23), U.UPDATE_DATE, 121) AS ACTION_DATE, 'UPLOAD' AS FILE_ACTION FROM AEP_FILE_UPLOAD_LOG U WHERE U.PERSON_ID = @PersonID
UNION
SELECT U.AEP_FILE_UPLOAD_LOG_ID, D.AEP_FILE_DOWNLOAD_LOG_ID, U.[FILE_NAME], LEFT(U.[FILE_NAME], CHARINDEX('_', U.[FILE_NAME]) - 1) + RIGHT(U.[FILE_NAME], 4) AS FILE_DISPLAY_NAME, D.USER_LOGIN, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(23), D.UPDATE_DATE, 121), SPACE(0)) AS ACTION_DATE, 'DOWNLOAD' AS FILE_ACTION FROM AEP_FILE_UPLOAD_LOG U INNER JOIN AEP_FILE_DOWNLOAD_LOG D ON U.AEP_FILE_UPLOAD_LOG_ID = D.AEP_FILE_UPLOAD_LOG_ID WHERE U.PERSON_ID = @PersonID ORDER BY ACTION_DATE DESC
